Name: Mathematics
Description: Explore the world of numbers, equations, and problem-solving. Learn concepts like algebra, geometry, and calculus.

Name: History
Description: Delve into the past to understand the events, cultures, and people that shaped our world. Discover ancient civilizations, wars, and revolutions.

Name: Biology
Description: Study living organisms and their interactions. Learn about cells, genetics, evolution, and ecosystems.

Name: Chemistry
Description: Explore the properties, composition, and reactions of matter. Discover elements, compounds, and chemical reactions.

Name: Physics
Description: Uncover the fundamental laws governing the universe. Study motion, energy, forces, and the behavior of matter and light.

Name: English Literature
Description: Dive into literary works, analyze themes, characters, and narratives. Explore classic and contemporary literature.

Name: Computer Science
Description: Learn about algorithms, programming, data structures, and software development. Explore the world of technology and innovation.

Name: Art
Description: Express your creativity through various artistic mediums. Study techniques, art history, and different artistic styles.

Name: Music
Description: Discover the world of sound, rhythm, and melody. Study music theory, instruments, and musical composition.

Name: Physical Education
Description: Engage in physical activities and sports to promote health and fitness. Learn about teamwork, sportsmanship, and exercise.

Name: Geography
Description: Explore the Earth's landscapes, climates, and cultures. Study maps, geographical features, and human-environment interactions.

Name: Foreign Languages
Description: Learn a new language to communicate with people from different cultures. Study vocabulary, grammar, and conversational skills.

Name: Economics
Description: Understand how societies allocate resources and make decisions about production and consumption. Study concepts of supply and demand, market structures, and more.

Name: Psychology
Description: Explore the human mind and behavior. Learn about psychological theories, cognitive processes, and mental health.

Name: Environmental Science
Description: Study the interactions between humans and the environment. Learn about sustainability, ecosystems, and environmental issues.

Name: Philosophy
Description: Engage in philosophical inquiry about fundamental questions of existence, knowledge, ethics, and reality.

Name: Sociology
Description: Examine human society and social interactions. Study topics like culture, social institutions, and societal change.

Name: Health Education
Description: Learn about maintaining a healthy lifestyle, making informed health decisions, and understanding the human body.

Name: Drama
Description: Immerse yourself in the world of theater and acting. Study scripts, performance techniques, and theatrical history.

Name: World Religions
Description: Explore different religious beliefs, practices, and traditions from around the world. Learn about cultural and spiritual diversity.
